title: An object between Earth and Moon

content.question: The distance between the centers of Earth and the Moon is <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. If the mass of the Earth is <math alttext="uppercase M sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and the mass of the Moon is <math alttext="uppercase M sub uppercase M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, which of the following is a correct expression for the magnitude of the acceleration of an object that is located halfway between the two bodies, a distance <math alttext="one half D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>D</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> from their centers?

choices.label: <math alttext="4 G times the fraction uppercase M sub E minus uppercase M sub uppercase M, over D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>G</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mo>−</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.1ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.15ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mi>D</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 G times the fraction uppercase M sub E minus uppercase M sub uppercase M, over D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>G</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mo>−</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.25ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mi>D</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="G times the fraction uppercase M sub E plus uppercase M sub uppercase M, over D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>G</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.25ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mi>D</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 G times the fraction uppercase M sub E plus uppercase M sub uppercase M, over D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>G</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mo>+</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.25ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mi>D</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="4 G times the fraction uppercase M sub E plus uppercase M sub uppercase M, over D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>G</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mo>+</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.25ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mi>D</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="4 G times the fraction uppercase M sub E minus uppercase M sub uppercase M, over D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>G</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mo>−</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.1ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.15ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mi>D</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
